sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE162010 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO , TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL , PNSN_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_FNN_CMP , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PYM_AMT , IPNSN_SVNG_ACCDDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #pnsnSvngAccAccno# , #taxVvalKrnCd# , #pnsnSvngAccPnsnSvngCl# , ( SELECT MANGE_ITEM11 FROM BASS0300 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND RPSTTV_CD = 'Y005' AND COMM_CD = #pnsnSvngFnnOrgnCd#) , #pnsnSvngAccFnnCmp# , #pnsnSvngAccPymAmt# , #ipnsnSvngAccddcAmt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr#)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE YE162010 SET PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL = #pnsnSvngAccPnsnSvngCl# , PNSN_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD = ( SELECT MANGE_ITEM11 FROM BASS0300 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND RPSTTV_CD = 'Y005' AND COMM_CD = #pnsnSvngFnnOrgnCd#) , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_FNN_CMP = #pnsnSvngAccFnnCmp# , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PYM_AMT = #pnsnSvngAccPymAmt# , IPNSN_SVNG_ACCDDC_AMT = #ipnsnSvngAccddcAmt# , ISMT = #ismt# , REVN_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR = #revnAddr#
WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO = #pnsnSvngAccAccno# AND TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD = #taxVvalKrnCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE162010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO=#pnsnSvngAccAccno# AND TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD = #taxVvalKrnCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO , TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, TAX_VVAL_KRN_CD) AS TAX_VVAL_KRN_NM , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PNSN_SVNG_CL , PNSN_SVNG_FNN_ORGN_CD , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_FNN_CMP , PNSN_SVNG_ACC_PYM_AMT , IPNSN_SVNG_ACCDDC_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , REVN_DT FROM YE162010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PNSN_SVNG_ACC_ACCNO=#pnsnSvngAccAccno#

SELECT COUNT (*) totcnt FROM (SELECT AA.SYSTEMKEY FROM YE162010 AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# UNION ALL SELECT BB.SYSTEMKEY FROM YE162020 BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND BB.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# UNION ALL SELECT CC.SYSTEMKEY FROM YE162030 CC WHERE CC.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND CC.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CC.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND CC.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# UNION ALL SELECT DD.SYSTEMKEY FROM YE162040 DD WHERE DD.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND DD.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND DD.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND DD.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE162010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
